'''''Paban's Milk Run''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
# Give eight [[Milk]] to Paban

==Request Details==
"Tales of Humanity":<br>
Calling all honest and upstanding milk suppliers!
<br>We're hoping to find a regular weekly supply of high-quality {{color|buzzword|milk}}.<br>
Regarding compensation for the milk and your service fee, please consult our partner Paban.<br>
The Steambird's editorial department looks forward to working with you.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Paban needs 8 bottles of milk.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About Milk...
::'''Paban:''' Are you the interested supplier?
::'''Paban:''' Have you prepared your dairy product samples? Don't worry, they'll be safe with me.
::{{DIcon|Quest}} Samples are ready.
:::'''Paban:''' Very well. Here is the fee for your samples, with a service fee added in. I will inform you when a supplier has been selected.
::{{DIcon}} Not yet.
:::'''Paban:''' Well, I'd suggest you hurry, then. You're not the only party after this contract.
{{Dialogue End}}
